ygData.subject: Re: Question:Tinkering skill max? Yeah or Nay?
ygData.msgSnippet: I would be surprised if tinkering skill depended on your level, since other trade skills don t, as far as I know. ... From:  To:
ygData.messageBody:
I would be surprised if tinkering skill depended on your level, since other
trade skills don't, as far as I know.

----- Original Message -----
From: <sragan@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, November 03, 1999 4:32 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Question:Tinkering skill max? Yeah or Nay?


> From: sragan@...
>
> Hi Folks,
>
> Ok I've seen the posts where folks say we have a skill max of 5 x
(level -15). As a 35th level wizzy that would put my skill max at 100.
>
> Are we SURE about this? Why do I see Master Fletchers with a skill of 200
that are lower level than I am? Is this max just a Tinker thing?
>
> *FizzWizz quotes her mantra* , "Verant Bastards!".
>
> Can someone confirm this for me? Its going to be hell getting thru 35, and
it may be a while before I'm 36 =( I would hate to think my tinkering is
dependent on killing more lizzys in Cazic.
>
> Cheers,
>
> "FizzWizz" of tunare
>
>
